name: cphqss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl2anc(wcel(c0, ccph), wss(cq, c1), wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), cdr))
stmt.pretty: syl2anc(c0 ∈ CPreHil, ℚ ⊆ c1, c1 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld), (CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ DivRing)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wss(cq, c1))

-| wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), cdr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c1, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, c1), cdr)), wss(cq, c1))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → ℚ ⊆ c1)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c1 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld))
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil →(CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ DivRing)
⊣ ((c1 ∈(SubRing ` CCfld)∧(CCfld[|`s]c1)∈ DivRing)→ ℚ ⊆ c1)

comment: The scalar field of a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space contains the rational numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Oct-2015.)
